name: Kipto, The Shipper
imagePrompt: A friendly, digitally-augmented Kimmo in a builder's hard hat, surrounded by floating holographic 'Orb' app screens and lines of code, beaming enthusiastically. Style: Vibrant, futuristic, slightly cartoonish.
abilityText: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 'Feature Request' with Rush. It will be implemented. Eventually. Probably.
flavorText: Always shipping something new. Sometimes it's features. Sometimes it's bugs. It's called agile development.
